title: Highland Lover
description: HIGHLAND DANGEREver inquisitive, Lady Alyson MacGillivray embarks on a sea voyage and makes a shocking The young future king of Scotland is secretly traveling on board. Yet her surprise soon turns to terror when pirates attack the ship, take the boy prince hostage, and leave Lady Alyson to drown. HIGHLAND WOLFKnown to the world as the The Wolf, Captain Jake Maxwell had been commissioned by the King to follow the prince's secret transport. When he spies Alyson struggling against a violent sea, he moves swiftly to save her. Soon desire sparks between them, bringing them pleasure-powerful and deep. But the young beauty's connection to the prince's abduction puts her in danger. And if their love is to survive, Alyson and Jake must play a game of intrigue with royal-and lethal-consequences."One of the best Scottish historical romance authors writing today."-Midwest Book Review
author: Amanda Scott
